mapper.select:
SELECT CASE WHEN ETH.RESULT_CODE = 00 THEN '성공' ELSE '실패' END RESULT_GUBN , DATE_FORMAT(ETH.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') REG_DT , ETH.ENTER_API_CODE, ETH.SERVICE_KEY, ETH.RESULT_CODE , ETH.PARKING_AREA_CODE, ETH.CAR_NUMBER_RECV , DATE_FORMAT(ETH.ENTER_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ENTER_DT, ETH.ERR_MSG, ETH.RESULT_MSG, ETH.WALLET_FREE_YN , ETH.REDUCE_CODE, ETH.REDUCE_NM, ETH.REDUCE_RATE, DATE_FORMAT(ETH.MDFCN_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') MDFCN_DT FROM T_ENTER_API_HISTORY ETH WHERE 1=1 AND ETH.RESULT_CODE != '00'
AND ETH.CAR_NUMBER_RECV LIKE '%${carNumber}%'
AND DATE_FORMAT(ETH.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #{startDate} AND DATE_FORMAT(ETH.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #{endDate} ORDER BY ETH.REG_DT DESC
